verses.name: Luke 8:19
verses.text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren, and could not come at him for the press.

verses.name: Luke 8:20
verses.text: And it was told him by certain which said, Thy mother and thy brethren stand without, desiring to see thee.

verses.name: Luke 8:21
verses.text: And he answered and said unto them, My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God, and do it.

verses.name: Luke 8:22
verses.text: Now it came to pass on a certain day, that he went into a ship with his disciples: and he said unto them, Let us go over unto the other side of the lake. And they launched forth.
